texts.name: Maxon
texts.biography: Maxon found giant turtles in a cove far from Regna islands. Now he tamed some of them and bring them back to his hometown. His experience impressed all of his friends.

specialty.name: Gaint Turtles
specialty.description: Increases Speed of any Gaint Turtle or Dragon Turtle by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 6 levels (rounded up)
